name: Trig Adventure
description:
In Trig Adventure, you will learn the values of Sine of special angles and test your memory in a form of 2D platformer game.

In the Option Menu, choose whether you want specific "Angle Quadrants" to be included in the game test areas. You can use the arrow keys or the AWSD keys to navigate. You can also choose to use Space key or the Up key to be used to do a "double jump".
